segments.text: Thank god you are open ! I have an emergency !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , Mr . Henderson what can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need this dress and this suit dry cleaned ASAP !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , I can have it ready by the end of the week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , you don ’ t understand , I need this tomorrow morning ! I accidentally spilled beer all over my wife ’ s dress and we have a wedding to attend tomorrow ! She ’ s gonna kill me !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , I can have it ready tomorrow afternoon , but this suit is also very stained . I can ’ t guarantee we can remove it completely .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine ! Can you also iron and starch this shirt ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great ! This is our secret ! If you see my wife , say nothing to her about this !
segments.speaker: S1
